scenarios.name: smoke-and-fire-detection
scenarios.tagline: An intelligent Early Fire Signs Detection system aimed at safeguarding people and facilities.
scenarios.overview: Early Fire Signs Detection is designed to spot early signs of smoke and fire and helps save lives and mitigate damages caused by industry fires. We aim to create safe workplaces by offering innovative, reliable, flexible, and scalable solutions.

scenarios.name: ppe-detection
scenarios.tagline: Prevent Workplace Injuries and Occupational Hazards with Vision AI.
scenarios.overview: Detect presence or absence of PPE (Personal Protective Equipments). Get real-time (configurable) events when employees are non compliant. Supports helmets, safety boots, vests, masks, and eye goggles

scenarios.name: smoking-detection
scenarios.tagline: No smoking & No vaping zone enforcements with Vision AI.
scenarios.overview: Enforce no-smoking, no-vaping compliance policies in and around an organization. Model is trained for detecting people who are smoking or vaping.

scenarios.name: rust-and-corrosion-detection
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the safety of employees by inspecting machine equipment for the presence of rust/corrosion.
scenarios.overview: Preventative maintenance for equipments. Rust/Corrosion detection model is designed to detect regions of rust/corrosion if any in machine parts, manufacturing equipments etc.

scenarios.name: slip-and-fall-detection
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the safety of employees by inspecting slip and fall instances. Get real-time alerts when such kind of accidents occur at the workplace.
scenarios.overview: Designed to detect slip and fall instances with high accuracy. Additionally, our model trained on real-world images minimizes false-positives or false-negatives. Timely action in the event of a Fall/Slip accident can minimize damage and save lives.

scenarios.name: face-blur
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the privacy of individuals in public spaces.
scenarios.overview: Face blurring privacy model can be used to protect the identity of individuals in images. Face Blurring is designed to ensure that the privacy of individuals is respected while still allowing the public to have access to the video feed.

FACE_BLUR.description: Blurred all the faces detected in the system

scenarios.name: people-taking-picture-detection
scenarios.tagline: Get real-time alerts when workers are taking pictures at the workplace, a monitoring system that can detect camera usage on company-owned devices or company networks.
scenarios.overview: People taking picture detection model can be used to safely detect mobile phone usage (people taking pictures, recording or streaming videos/audios, sending texts in prohibited areas) by providing real-time video feeds of the area.

scenarios.name: ergonomics-detection
scenarios.tagline: Ensure safety and comfort of employees by monitoring ergonomics.
scenarios.overview: Ergonomics detection model can be used to monitor productivity and workers health by providing real-time video feeds of different areas.The primary focus of ergonomics is to create environments that optimize human performance and well-being.

scenarios.name: occupancy-monitoring
scenarios.tagline: Transform the way you manage occupancy in real-time with our cutting-edge Computer Vision Occupancy Monitoring Solution
scenarios.overview: Monitor the number of people in a given area and get alerts when a person is present in the frame for more than restricted time

EXCECCED_TIME_LIMIT.description: Person is present in the room more than the restricted time

scenarios.name: firearms-detection
scenarios.tagline: New Technology aims to improve Firearm Detection and Save Lives with VisionAI.
scenarios.overview: The goal of firearms detection is to prevent violence and ensure public safety by detecting and responding to the presence of firearms including knives, guns and other weapons.

scenarios.name: spills-and-leaks-detection
scenarios.tagline: Spills and Leaks detection through Vision AI.
scenarios.overview: Designed to detect spills and leaks including water puddles, water leaks and slippery surfaces. The model can analyze images and video footage to identify visual anomalies, such as the appearance of a spill or leak, which can be missed by human inspectors.
events: Machinery/equipment detected with spills and/or leaks

scenarios.name: equipment-temperature-detection
scenarios.tagline: Monitor equipment temperature. Get an alert when temperature exceeds a limit or below a threshold.
scenarios.overview: Our solution detects equipment temperature and performance by processing real-time images and videos from different sources. In addition, it can trigger an alarm (as soon as the temperature reaches the threshold margins or faulty equipment is detected) and identify areas where exits are present.

scenarios.name: gas-leak-detection
scenarios.tagline: Gas leaks detection through VisionAI.
scenarios.overview: Our solution aimed at detecting the infrared radiation emitted by objects and can be used to visualize gas leaks that are invisible to the naked eye. The infrared cameras can be used for leak detection in large areas, such as pipelines and storage tanks.

scenarios.name: fall-and-accident-detection
scenarios.tagline: Detect potential collision/accident and wet floor, inspect slip and fall instances with VisionAI.
scenarios.overview: Fall & Accident computer vision based detection system is designed to detect potential safety hazards in a given environment. The system uses video data from cameras placed in the area to identify a range of potential hazards, including person slip & fall, potential collision/accident, wet floor, debris on the floor, and wet/slippery signs.

scenarios.name: text-blur
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the privacy of individuals by obscuring documents and other signs in camera feeds.
scenarios.overview: The model works in a way that it ensures that documents and signs are fully and effectively obscured so that it cannot be read or easily recovered by others. The model uses a detection algorithm followed by computer vision techniques to obscure texts in images and videos.

scenarios.name: license-plate-blur
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the privacy of vehicle owners in images and videos by blurring licence plates.
scenarios.overview: License plate blurring can be a useful and intended application in certain contexts, such as when capturing images or video in public places or in situations where license plates may contain sensitive or identifying information. This technology can help protect the privacy and security of individuals by blurring or obscuring license plate numbers.

scenarios.name: sign-blur
scenarios.tagline: Ensure the privacy of individuals by obscuring signs in camera feeds.
scenarios.overview: The model works in a way that it ensures that signs are fully and effectively obscured so that it cannot be read or easily recovered by others. The model uses a detection algorithm followed by computer vision techniques to obscure texts in images and videos.

scenarios.name: obstructed-camera-detection
scenarios.tagline: Keep your camera view clear with our obstructed camera detection model.
scenarios.overview: The aim of an obstructed camera detection model is to detect whether a cameras field of view is obstructed or not. This model is designed to detect various types of obstructions such as fingers, tape, post-it notes, or other physical objects that might block the camera view.

scenarios.name: fire-extinguisher-detection
scenarios.tagline: Strengthen your smoke & fire detection compliance - through adding custom logic for checking for missing fire extinguisher from required places.
scenarios.overview: Make your workplace safer with our VisionAI monitoring, a computer vision and deep learning-based solution that helps you detect missing fire extinguishers by analyzing visual data, making it easier for businesses to ensure that they have the necessary safety equipment in place.

scenarios.name: blocked-exit-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring blocked-exits

scenarios.name: temperature-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring the temperature for better health and safety

scenarios.name: working-at-heights
scenarios.overview: Preventative maintenance. Person detection without PFAS, Steps detection without railings, Person detection at height without parapets and Ladder detected not in compliance
events: Person detected at height without parapets

scenarios.name: empty-pallet-detection
scenarios.overview: Preventative maintenance. Detect empty pallets

scenarios.name: hand-wash-detection
scenarios.overview: Preventative maintenance. Detect whether people are missing hand wash or not.

scenarios.name: worker-fatigue-detection
scenarios.overview: Preventative maintenance. Fatigue detection to reduce fatigue related fatalities and incidents.

scenarios.name: water-mangement
scenarios.overview: Water management

scenarios.name: restricted-zone
scenarios.tagline: Secure restricted areas with our powerful AI-based monitoring system that detects and prevents unauthorized access in real-time.
scenarios.overview: With our Vision AI restricted area monitoring solution you can authorize access as well as continuous monitor live feeds inside a restricted area for real-time detection of unauthorized personnel.

scenarios.name: confined-space-monitoring
scenarios.tagline: Ensure safety of employees in confined spaces. Get real-time alerts when workers are present in the space for too long.
scenarios.overview: Aimed at monitoring the presence of workers in the confined space, as well as the duration of how long they are present within the space. Companies can put compliance policies in place to ensure that workers are not present in the confined space for an extended period of time.

scenarios.name: social-distance-detection
scenarios.overview: Detect distance between people in the frame
events: Different people observed in the frame and the distances between them

scenarios.name: desk-occupancy
scenarios.tagline: Revolutionize your workspace with our Smart Desk Occupancy Tracker.
scenarios.overview: Our next-gen AI models detect and count the presence of people within a specific area, whether they are performing a particular task or not, their dwell time, occupancy density and many more metrics. Summary of occupancy metrics on a per desk/station basis
events: Daily summary of occupancy metrics on a per desk/station basis

scenarios.name: occupancy-metrics
scenarios.tagline: Track workplace Occupancy Metrics effortlessly.
scenarios.overview: Our Vision AI occupancy metrics monitoring solution provides real-time insights and analysis to optimize various aspects of a business operation, from customer experiences and marketing strategies to operational efficiencies. Our ready-to-deploy model is designed to provide businesses and organizations with valuable insights such as occupnacy count, dwell time, heat maps, queue management and occupancy alerts.

OCCUPANCY_METRICS_SUMMARY.description: Daily summary event of different metrics related related to occupancy

scenarios.name: no-visitors
scenarios.tagline: An intelligent way to enhance security and prevent unauthorized access to restricted areas.
scenarios.overview: Make your workplace safer and smarter with our VisionAI monitoring, a complete solution that helps you enforce security policy adherence and deter intruders effectively. Now, you can easily detect any attempts to gain unauthorized access with our fully automated system that guards your facility 24/7 and sends instant alerts to help you prevent a security breach before it occurs.

scenarios.name: no-food
scenarios.tagline: An easier, smarter way to enforce policies with VisionAI
scenarios.overview: Our solution instantly alerts the appropriate personnel to take action and proves to be an effective tool for enforcing a 'no food and drinks' policy in an organizational setting, improving hygiene and safety measures, and ensuring compliance with regulations.

scenarios.name: energy-conservation
scenarios.tagline: Going Green: Innovative Solutions for Energy Conservation and Sustainable Living with Vision AI.
scenarios.overview: Our solution can analyze building occupancy patterns to optimize heating and cooling systems, identify lighting fixtures that consume excessive energy, or identify appliances and equipment that need to be replaced to improve energy efficiency.
tags: Identify lighting fixtures that consume excessive energy

ENERGY_CONSERVATION_SUMMARY.description: Occupancy pattern summary & lighting pattern recommendations

scenarios.name: waste-management
scenarios.tagline: Innovative Technologies for Efficient Waste Management Detection with Vision AI.
scenarios.overview: Monitor waste disposal practices, such as identifying and tracking waste streams, monitoring waste storage and handling procedures, and identifying potential environmental hazards. Our solution focused on the detection of waste management events by identifying opportunities for waste reduction, recycling, and cost savings.
tags: Monitoring waste storage and handling procedures

scenarios.name: unauthorized-entry
scenarios.overview: Unauthorized entry or tailgating detection

scenarios.name: perimeter-control
scenarios.overview: Perimeter/fence control

scenarios.name: equipment-vibration-monitoring
scenarios.tagline: Monitor equipment vibrations. Get an alert when vibration exceeds a limit.
scenarios.overview: Model is aimed at monitoring equipment vibrations and detecting the vibration of equipment and alerting the user if the vibration exceeds a limit. This can be used to detect any potential failure in the equipment.

scenarios.name: equipment-noise-monitoring
scenarios.tagline: Monitor equipment noise levels. Get an alert when noise exceeds a limit.
scenarios.overview: Model is aimed at monitoring equipment noise levels and detecting the noise levels of equipment and alerting the user if the noise exceeds a limit. This can be used to detect any potential failure in the equipment.

scenarios.name: reading-analog-dials
scenarios.tagline: Monitor analog dials and generate periodic events.
scenarios.overview: Vision AI-based model for monitoring analog dials using camera would be detecting the analog dials and generating periodic events. This can be used to monitor analog dials.

scenarios.name: tools-checkout-monitoring
scenarios.tagline: Monitor tools check-in/out and generate periodic events.
scenarios.overview: Vision AI-based tool checkout monitoring model is used to ensure that all tools that employees use - go through a common checkout process. Event is raised when employees don't check-out the tool and carry them out. Configuration is required to mark where the check-out counter is located.

scenarios.name: environment-temperature-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring the envionment temperature for better health and safety

scenarios.name: environment-humidity-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring the environment humidity

scenarios.name: environment-pressure-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring the pressure for better health and safety

scenarios.name: air-quality-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Monitoring the environment for better health and safety

scenarios.name: light-sensor-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Light sensor monitoring

scenarios.name: noise-level-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Noise level monitoring

scenarios.name: radiation-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Radiation level monitoring
events: Detected radiation level above configured limit

scenarios.overview: Loitering detection
events: Event fired when a person enters from an usually closed location.
Event fired when when person detected during off-hours.
Event fired when person detected for extended duration of time.

scenarios.name: suspicious-package-detection
scenarios.overview: Suspicious package detection
events: Event fired when a suspicious package is detected without owner (abandoned package event).

scenarios.name: fighting-detection
scenarios.overview: Bullying/fighting/aggressive behavior detection
events: Event fired when bullying/fighting/aggressive behavior is detected.

scenarios.name: energy-usage-monitoring
scenarios.overview: Energy usage monitoring

scenarios.overview: Vandalism, graffiti & company property destruction
events: People detected in area (more granular event)
Unauthorized personnel detected in area (based on uniform/badge)
Vandalism detected in area (before & after changes)
Paint/graffiti detected in area (before & after changes)
Behavior analysis event showing company property destruction.

scenarios.overview: Shoplifting and/or theft detection

scenarios.overview: Shipping activity detection
events: Suspicious shipping activity detected from non-designated area
Suspicious shipping activity detected during after-hours

events: Vehicle activity detected in non-designtated areas

events: Forklift observed outside of configured zone
